subject: Paul Newman dies - Spiricomp EVP contact attempt
author: M.A. Coletta (Mike)
full_text:
It was announced today that Paul Newman died at the age of 83. They 
said he died of cancer on Friday.
When I heard this sad news I attempted to listen for contact using my 
Spiricomp RSH 12-469/12-470 EVP Ghost Box System configuration. There 
is a video of that attempt at my website or blog.

http://www.ufomagazine.net
or
http://www.ufomagazine.blogspot.com

Thanks
- Mike Coletta
